item.title: Chris is starting a blog in 2017
item.description: #Why? A quick Google search turns up articles from as early as 2012 insisting that blogging is a dead medium. While this premonition didn’t turn out to be completly true, I think it is fair to say blogging isn’t in its heyday.1 So, why am I starting a blog now? ###Unavailability of low-stakes writing in academia In my day-to-day life, I do a fair amount of writing, but it’s a very specific type, mostly comprising of technical papers and grant proposals.
